Never ever fall for something that happens at the moment in exchange for something you've known for a lifetime. Girls, don't ever risk an amazing friendship for a boy you think is worth it. Boys, don't ever think you can fool a girl...chances are you can't trick her out of something she loves.
There are no excuses for not having self-control, so why can't we control ourselves when we have no doubt in our head that its wrong?
Why can't people just face themselves with the truth and do what's right? Why must things fall completely apart to get the point across?
Is that how God wants it to be? i don't think He wants it to be that way,  but it's the only way things can be right in our world.
Forgiveness is a very hard thing to make yourself do, i still haven't managed to do it for some people....see sometimes i can forgive but i can't forget.
I don't care if you wanted revenge, jealousy, or lust..I personally believe it is wrong to try and trick or tear best friends apart for your wishes.
How dumb do some people have to be?
Seriously.
and I'm sorry for everyone who had to get involved in this, I feel like i wasted my time and I've lost so much that i have to gain back

well ya that was my day in a nutshell
